title: VOICE ONT SECURE URI PROFILE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command creates a Secure URI Profile.

It provides (via pointers to other profiles) both the URI for accessing 
information plus the security information necessary to access the information
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure pon ( no sec-uri-profile (index) ) | ( sec-uri-profile (index) name <AsamProfileName> [ no auth-securi-prof | auth-securi-prof <Gpon::AuthProfileName> ] uri-prof <Gpon::UriProfileName> )

command_parameters.name: name
command_parameters.description: A string 1..32 characters long which uniquely identifies this Secure URI Profile mandatory parameter - a profile name - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.] - length: 1<=x<=32

command_parameters.name: [no] auth-securi-prof
command_parameters.description: Authentication security profile that contains network address of the security server optional parameter with default value: "none"
values: Index of the Authentication security profile
range: [0...20] Data driven field type Possible values are depending on the actual configuration and software. The currently allowed values can be shown with online-help.

command_parameters.name: uri-prof
command_parameters.description: uri profile that contains network address of the configuration server mandatory parameter Table "Voice ONT Secure URI profile Configuration command" Display Parameters Specific Information:
values: Index of the URI profile that contains the IP address of the server
range: [0...100] Data driven field type Possible values are depending on the actual configuration and software. The currently allowed values can be shown with online -help.

command_parameters.name: auth-securi-prof-name
command_parameters.description: name of the authentication security uri profile This element is only shown in detail mode. - ignored printable string

command_parameters.name: uri-prof-name
command_parameters.description: name of the uri profile This element is only shown in detail mode. - ignored printable string

raw:
help configure pon sec-uri-profile
VOICE ONT SECURE URI PROFILE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==================================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command creates a Secure URI Profile.

It provides (via pointers to other profiles) both the URI for accessing 
information plus the security information necessary to access the information


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure pon ( no sec-uri-profile (index) ) | ( sec-uri-profile (index) name 
<AsamProfileName> [ no auth-securi-prof | auth-securi-prof 
<Gpon::AuthProfileName> ] uri-prof <Gpon::UriProfileName> )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "Voice ONT Secure URI profile Configuration command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(index)                    a unique profile index

Table "Voice ONT Secure URI profile Configuration command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

name                       A string 1..32 characters long which uniquely 
identifies this Secure URI Profile
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <AsamProfileName>
                           Format:
                           - a profile name
                           - range: [a-zA-Z0-9-_.]
                           - length: 1<=x<=32 

[no] auth-securi-prof      Authentication security profile that contains 
network address of the security server
                           optional parameter with default value: "none"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::AuthProfileName>
                           Format:
                           ( none
                           | <Gpon:AuthProfPtr>
                           | name : <AsamProfileName> )
                           Possible values:
                           - none                  : no profile to associate
                           - name                  : profile name
                           Field type <Gpon:AuthProfPtr>
                           - Index of the Authentication security profile
                           - range: [0...20]
                           Data driven field type
                           Possible values are depending on the actual 
configuration and software.
                           The currently allowed values can be shown with 
online-help.

uri-prof                   uri profile that contains network address of the 
configuration server
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::UriProfileName>
                           Format:
                           ( none
                           | <Gpon:UriProfilePtr>
                           | name : <AsamProfileName> )
                           Possible values:
                           - none                  : no profile to associate
                           - name                  : profile name
                           Field type <Gpon:UriProfilePtr>
                           - Index of the URI profile that contains the IP 
address of the server
                           - range: [0...100]
                           Data driven field type
                           Possible values are depending on the actual 
configuration and software.
                           The currently allowed values can be shown with online
-help.


Table "Voice ONT Secure URI profile Configuration command" Display Parameters

Specific Information:

Parameter                  Description

 auth-securi-prof-name     name of the authentication security uri profile
                           This element is only shown in detail mode.

                           parameter type: <Gpon::IgnoredPrintableString>
                           - ignored printable string

 uri-prof-name             name of the uri profile
                           This element is only shown in detail mode.

                           parameter type: <Gpon::IgnoredPrintableString>
                           - ignored printable string

DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
